Helgz Studio / Contemporary Ceramics

Helgz Studio was launched in 2021 as a passion-driven microbusiness, exploring my creativity in a tactile, hands-on medium. I design contemporary slow-made ceramics that aim to bring moments of stillness into any space.

I handle all aspects of the studio, including ceramics production, design, photography, branding collateral, e-commerce, and marketing.

I handle all aspects of the studio, including ceramics production, design, photography, branding collateral, e-commerce, and marketing.

A few samples of my ceramic creations.

My most ambitious project: a modular coffee table. Each leg of the table is hand-built using ceramic slabs.
I'm always looking for ways to improve the collector's experience: I design branded packaging items like postcards and stickers when sending out a package.

Press

Featured in Condé Nast's The World of Interiors Magazine, Top of the Pots feature of Summer 2022
